front.title: A Unified LISP Mapping Database for L2 and L3 Network Virtualization Overlays

abstract.t: The purpose of this draft is to document how the Locator/ID Separation Protocol (LISP) Control Plane can be used to offer a unified (offering L2 AND L3) Overlay solution that matches the framework and requirements of Network Virtualization over L3 (NVO3). This information is provided as input to the NVO3 analysis of the suitability of existing IETF protocols to the NVO3 requirements.
